parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
